title: MNF Recap, News Updates, and TNF Preview FROM LONDON!
itunes:title: MNF Recap, News Updates, and TNF Preview FROM LONDON!
description:
A hotel suite filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all the latest news from around the league, starting with a Monday Night Football recap of the NFC East showdown between the Giants and Cowboys (3:30). The heroes hit some injury news (23:11), the impacts of Hurricane Ian (31:26), and the latest on the Pro Bowl Games (39:05). Finally, we preview the Thursday night matchup between the red-hot Miami Dolphins and the Cincinnati Bengals (43:03). 

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
